document.full_text: fresh off his first three-homer game, the mets' carlos beltran arrived in the city where he once had a career three months, including one of the most productive octobers in history.
document.title: victory lap for beltran in houston
lines_and_colors: fresh off his first three-homer game, the mets' carlos beltran arrived in the city where he once had a career three months, including one of the most productive octobers in history.
